p:
In order to execute the EBM under estimated paleoclimate conditions, we require a set of transfer functions for each input parameter (air temperature at mast height, precipitation, longwave downwelling radiation, total shortwave downwelling radiation) at our input time step (1 h) from the available proxy data. In the following sections, we develop equations of the form
where χ is the parameter of interest and Ψ is a paleo proxy. The subscripts index time such that χ
ydh represents the value of χ at year y before present (BP), day of year d, and hour h. The notation χ 0 dh represents the modern (at year zero BP) measured values for the parameter of interest.
